      • userBalace

        public java.math.BigDecimal userBalace​(int uDNI)
        Returns the amount of balance that the user has on his card.
        Parameters:
        uDNI - ID of the user whose card balance we are going to verify.
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of the user's balance on the card.

      • addBalance

        Parameters:

      • paymentAuthoritation

        public void paymentAuthoritation​(Order o,
                                 int uDNI)
        Send an email to the user with the validation code to make the payment of a specific order.
        Parameters:
        o - The specific order to pay.
        uDNI - The ID of the user who is going to pay for the order.

      • payRegister

        public void payRegister​(Payment p,
                        int nCard)
                 throws WrongTransactionException
        Register the payment of an order with a specific card.
        Parameters:
        p - Payment data.
        nCard - The number of the card with which we are going to make the payment.
        Throws:
        WrongTransactionException - If the operation to be performed fails because the data entered is incorrect.

      • payconfirm

        public void payconfirm​(int idord,
                       int iduser,
                       java.lang.String code)
        Check that the payment has been made correctly and the order status has been changed to PAYED.
        Parameters:
        idord - Contains the id of the Order to obtain his code.
        iduser - Contains the user id.
        code - The code introduced by the user.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the PAYED status aren't met.
        WrongTransactionException - If the operation to be performed fails because the data entered is incorrect.

        public Card vercard​(int iduser)
